body1: <StyledAppName></StyledAppName> was a platform aggregating trips focused on sports and movement around the world. We kicked it off with the business goal of creating an audience of travelers and a community of organizers that published their trips to it.
body2: We halted the project in 2023 due to the lack of traction and the lack of a clear business model. We learned a lot about the travel industry and the challenges of building a community around a niche topic.
